original_text: The inhabitants of Zidon and Arvad were thy mariners: thy wise men, O Tyrus, that were in thee, were thy pilots.
korean_text: 시돈과 아르왓 주민들이 네 사공이 되었음이여 두로야 네 가운데에 있는 지혜자들이 네 선장이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: The inhabitants of Zidon and Arvad were thy mariners:
thy wise men, O Tyrus, that were in thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 오 두로여, 네 안에 있던 너의 지혜로운 사람들이
